Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards

Class IdentityCard

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.Card
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.IdentityCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resettable
public class IdentityCard extends Card
Class representing an Identity cards.

Identity cards are instantiated at a player's instantiation and kept for the duration of the whole game.

It comes with an identity (Villager or Witch) and by its reveal status. The cards' identity is the same as its owner's and is reset at the end of each round. If it is revealed, we consider the owner's identity has been revealed.

IdentityCard extends Card :

This abstract class is extended by both Rumour cards and Identity cards.

A card can be revealed or not.

A card can be reset to its original state.

All unrevealed cards are represented with the same picture.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()

      IdentityCards are reset by their owners when they are requested to reset themselves (at the end of each round).

      When reset, the card's reveal status becomes unrevealed and the identity associated with it is reinitialized.

      Specified by:
      reset in interface Resettable
      Overrides:
      reset in class Card
      See Also:
      • Round
      • Player.reset()
      • Resettable
